attributes.action: keep our vital resident's town car park and garages and communal spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia Community Action Group has been told the property developers are in the process of getting planning permission to build more housing at the cost of the community losing vital space. We will lose 38 garages and 76 car parking places if it goes ahead. There is nowhere to park safely and legally in the surrounding streets. Parking is limited and some streets have double yellow lines. This is already a built up area full of flats and cars and very little communual spaces. Please rethink how people will suffer if this goes ahead.
